ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Trip to Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: The former.  While some people have suggested your level is a factor in how Clouding works - I don t believe Wind Level is a factor (beyond missed notes on
ygData.messageBody:
The former. While some people have suggested your level is a factor in how
Clouding works - I don't believe Wind Level is a factor (beyond missed notes
on starting the song if the Wind Level is very low)

Slyde 39 of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: "Daryl Schwemley" <drs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 7:51 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Trip to Permafrost


>
> So my question is this, was something in the king's room casting see
invis,
> or did those skill increases in wind get me to the point where I was invis
> to more things? If the second is the case, I would recommend that you try
> to max that wind skill if you're having problems with not being invis to
> certain mobs.
>
